Posts.EditableText:
The Direct Sequel to The Shack will be launching exclusively on text adventures.co.uk and through the Quest app this winter!

Once again, I implore you to play through the app to do the game justice with atmospheric sounds and animations.

Of course it will be free. That should go without saying, but just clarifying as I have other projects in other engines which are not.

Continue in the shoes of The Protagonist, and prepare for a much deeper dive into the mystery surrounding them.

Cheers all!
Posts.HTML:
The Direct Sequel to The Shack will be launching exclusively on text adventures.co.uk and through the Quest app this winter!

Once again, I implore you to play through the app to do the game justice with atmospheric sounds and animations.

Of course it will be free. That should go without saying, but just clarifying as I have other projects in other engines which are not.

Continue in the shoes of The Protagonist, and prepare for a much deeper dive into the mystery surrounding them.

Cheers all!
